home.title: A cloud platform under HGL for all functions
home.subtitle: There is no productivity without self-custody.

serverlessPlatform.title: Serverless Platform
serverlessPlatform.description: A free and open source serverless platform for your web applications. Deploy functions without managing infrastructure.

multiLanguageSupport.title: Multi-Language Support
multiLanguageSupport.description: Build your next function in any programming language you're comfortable with. No restrictions, maximum flexibility.

instantDeployment.title: Instant Deployment
instantDeployment.description: Just push your code and everything else is handled automatically. No configuration headaches or deployment complexity.

autoScaling.title: Auto-Scaling
autoScaling.description: Functions scale automatically for any number of users - from the first user to millions, with consistent performance.

managedInfrastructure.title: Managed Infrastructure
managedInfrastructure.description: In memory storage with replication, sharding. Infrastructure nodes are all managed by Zygote automatically.

httpsInterfaces.title: HTTPS Interfaces
httpsInterfaces.description: Simple HTTPS-based architecture. You consume and provide HTTPS interfaces - that's all you need to worry about.

dataReliability.title: Data Reliability
dataReliability.description: No data is stored unless properly replicated and sharded. Your data is safe and always available when you need it.

selfCustodyOption.title: Self-Custody Option
selfCustodyOption.description: Fork Zygote.Run with your functions and data to run and maintain everything under your own custody if desired.
